index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the Grant Program Year January 1, 1981 through December 31, 1981; accepting financial assistance from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; appropriating funds received into the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund; abandoning certain unexpended unencumbered balances in previous project appropriations; authorizing implementation of certain projects by the Department of Administrative Services; Department of Community Development, Department of Construction and Land Use; Department of Engineering, Executive Department of Human Resources, Department of Parks and Recreation, and Department of Public Health; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
